wikipedia_page.main: Peter Gwynne Crowther (born 26 April 1952 in Neath) is a Welsh former cricketer active from 1977 to 1978 who played for Glamorgan. He appeared in nine first-class matches as a righthanded batsman who bowled off breaks. He scored 185 runs with a highest score of 99 and took one wicket with a best performance of one for 22.

response: Peter Crowther (born 1949) is a British journalist, short story writer, novelist, editor, publisher and anthologist. He is the founder (with Simon Conway) of PS Publishing. He edits a series of themed anthologies of science fiction short stories published by DAW books.  He is also the editor of Postscripts, an anthology established in 2004, releasing since 2012 the Exotic Gothic series.
